remarks: Injectivity of the parameterization ` inftyexpi ` .  Remark: a more conceptual proof would use ~ bj-inftyexpiinv and the fact that a function with a retraction is injective.  (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jun-2019.)
statement: bj-inftyexpiinj $p |- ( ( A e. ( -u _pi (,] _pi ) /\ B e. ( -u _pi (,] _pi ) ) -> ( A = B <-> ( inftyexpi ` A ) = ( inftyexpi ` B ) ) ) $.
